channel.title: WP7702 with LTE-enabled SIM issues
channel.description:
Hi
When I use WP7702 with an LTE and GSM-enabled SIM but *not* LTE-M1/LTE-NB enabled, the WP module does not use the GSM fallback. And even if I get it to use the GSM fallback it does not maintain a stable connection.
The only way for me to get a stable connection is by disabling LTE RAT completely using `at+ksrat=1`.
Is this a known issue, any known workarounds or fixes that doesn't involve completely disabling LTE?

item.title: WP7702 with LTE-enabled SIM issues
item.dc:creator: martijns
item.description:
Did you get any further with this issue? I seem to have the same behavior.

Read full topic
